title: Getting Started with React.js
introduction: React.js is a popular JavaScript library for building user interfaces. It allows developers to create reusable UI components, making the development process more efficient.
details: React.js is often used in single-page applications to create interactive and responsive user interfaces. It follows a component-based architecture, where each component manages its state and can be easily composed to build complex UIs. Learning React.js involves understanding JSX syntax, state management, lifecycle methods, and handling events.
